content: Pensavo aveste detto che non ne volevate parlare.
translations: eng:I thought that you said that you didn't want to talk about it
eng:I thought that you said you didn't want to talk about it
eng:I thought you said that you didn't want to talk about it
eng:I thought you said you didn't want to talk about it
